meanings.definition: A person who rides the leading left-hand horse of a team or pair drawing a coach or carriage, especially when there are two such riders.
meanings.sent1: The postillions guided the horses with skill and precision.
meanings.sent2: The coach was pulled by a pair of postillions on a sunny day.
meanings.sent3: The postillions wore fancy hats that made them look like horseback royalty.
meanings.sent4: In the race of life, the postillions of destiny steer our path.
meanings.sent5: The postillions' role was crucial in ensuring a smooth carriage ride.

meanings.definition: A pair of riders who ride the leading horses of a team or pair drawing a coach or carriage.
meanings.sent1: Two postillions sat confidently atop the majestic horses.
meanings.sent2: The postillions controlled the pace of the carriage effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The postillions' synchronized movements made them look like a horseback dance duo.
meanings.sent4: Their unity as postillions symbolized harmony and cooperation.
meanings.sent5: The postillions' presence added elegance to the carriage procession.
